title: Diagnosing Parkinson's Disease from Voice Using Random Forest and Conversion in TensorFlow Lite
description: This project presents a machine learning system for diagnosing Parkinson's disease through voice analysis using Random Forest classification. The model achieved 92% overall accuracy and 97% recall for Parkinson's patients, with an AUC-ROC of 0.96.
notes: First paper published in Syntavion Journal - Open Access Scientific Publishing for All Sciences. Includes Google Colab implementation.
